text: Mike Doughty (born December 2, 1936) is a former Kenyan rally co-driver best known for his work with Shekhar Mehta in the 1970s. == External links == * Driver profile, Rallybase.nl Category:1936 births Category:Living people Category:World Rally Championship co-drivers Category:Kenyan rally co-drivers
title: Mike Doughty (co-driver)
